77932.summary: Some customers in the Booth and Silver Heights area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77932.title: June 6 - Winnipeg (Booth, Silver Heights) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

77912.summary: Some customers in the South Ridge area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77912.title: June 5 - Medicine Hat  (South Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
